productDescription.productDescriptionInfo: The integrated M9 boosts the performance and processing capabilities of this iPhone. It ensures that Siri is always on and ready to execute your commands without hampering the battery's efficiency. It also lets you access a range of fitness-tracking features such as measuring the pace of your walk or jog by connecting to the built-in accelerometer.

The iPhone 6S brings to you the new 3D touch gesture. Not only does it gauge the pressure that you apply on the screen, but also responds to it with subtle taps so you know that it is already sensing what you're suggesting. For example, if you want to edit text in your Notes, e-mails, or Messages, all you have to do is press the keyboard within these apps to convert it into a trackpad and make the required changes with precision.

You needn't go through a multi-step procedure to do the things that you do the most during the day. Click pictures or shoot videos with a simple press of the Camera icon, send a new message to a particular contact by pressing the Messages icon, press the Maps icon to drop a pin to the current location, swipe right to mark an e-mail as unread or swipe left to move it to trash.

productReviews.reviewDescription: Replaced my Iphone 5s with New Iphone 6. This year again purchased my iphone from Flipkart & as always delivery was up-to the mark.
I got it as part of festival offer. I cant even call since the sound is feeble. Terrible and disappointed !
Device was not working. The device crashed on 1 hour of usage and was not booting up. Very bad quality product from flipkart.

productReviews.reviewTitle: Once an Iphone User, Always an Iphone User!!!
productReviews.reviewDescription: Everything is good about this iPhone except its Price :( People out there waiting for this iPhone including me from a very long time but unable to buy this due its over-price. I hope Apple India will realise this and soon bring its price down and will see some happy customers :) Cheers to those who are enjoying there brand new iPhone 6s (y)

productReviews.reviewTitle: Best you can get from apple
productReviews.reviewDescription: First impression - Very light and slim....Perfect to hold...awesome display and graphics..Gaming is smooth as butter...n got in nice packing from flipkart...Overall *****(5 star)

productReviews.reviewTitle: It's simply Awesome Review After 4 months
productReviews.reviewDescription: First of all, I like to thank flipkart for it's amazing deliver on time. I got this phone on the day it was released in INDIA. The packing was good.

negativeProductReview.reviewTitle: Nothing to say .bcoz this is iPhone
negativeProductReview.reviewDescription: Nothing to say .bcoz this is iPhone
Delivered on the dot. The packaging was perfect. Came with a 4G SIM, airtel that I used to swap my Wife's existing 3G SIM. There is not much to add about the phone. People who buy it, simply buy it.

negativeProductReview.reviewTitle: Apple iPhone 6s Gold 64 GB not delivered
negativeProductReview.reviewDescription: I was very excited to order iPhone 6s Gold 64 GB from flipkart on date 29 March 2016, I ordered it in the morning and received a notification from Flipkart that your order is cancelled.
Nice phone .got exchange on dewali offer. ......supercomnet is also trustworthy like ws retail. Sealed and 100percent genuine packing. Though shipment was delayed, happy with the product
iPhone 6s 64gb .Nice experience till now. Delivery is fast. Was not happy with packing. It could have been better.

Everything is good about this iPhone except its Price :( People out there waiting for this iPhone including me from a very long time but unable to buy this due its over-price. I hope Apple India will realise this and soon bring its price down and will see some happy customers :) Cheers to those who are enjoying there brand new iPhone 6s (y)

negativeProductReview.reviewTitle: Flipkart No EMI offer - a half truth!
negativeProductReview.reviewDescription: The phone is great - so, the rating is not for the phone. Even the delivery, packaging etc were okay. However, the phone was purchased under the so-called 'No EMI cost' offer which actually spoiled the entire experience. Flipkart claims that it gives you a discount of the entire EMI cost upfront which is only a half-truth. It doesn't show you the entire cost and gives only partial discount by making a fraudulent claim. There is no transparency in which portion they refund and which they do no...
Not a good phone, very expensive as per the experience. And battery performance is very bad in it.
You get everything in android in fraction of price
This is very expansive...
Before you bye beware of the malpractices by flipkart they are fraud they wil send you chinese products with same colur and format you will never get to know its a corrupt corporate.
Dont purchase it using EMI option,the bank wpuld charge you and though flipkart says its a no cost emi,it wouldn't help you.

Everything is good about this iPhone except its Price :( People out there waiting for this iPhone including me from a very long time but unable to buy this due its over-price. I hope Apple India will realise this and soon bring its price down and will see some happy customers :) Cheers to those who are enjoying there brand new iPhone 6s (y)
i'll add 20 to 25 k and i'll buy luxury phone why should i buy this phone which cost 15k more then old model of his
